content:
abrown commented on issue #2905:

@alexcrichton, one last comment I forgot to address before this gets merged:

Could a test be added for the wasm behavior as well?

Most of the Wasm side of things is tested using the Wasm SIMD spec tests. I think this type of thing is already covered somewhere in simd_bitwise.wast and/or simd_boolean.wast.
